articles.author: Bruce Haring
articles.title: Caitlin Clark Makes First Comments On Her Team America Olympics Snub - Deadline
articles.description: The rookie took the high road in her public comments, but her coach said the private Clark is keeping receipts.
articles.content:
Many sports pundits and fans were outraged that NCAA all-time scoring leader and heralded WNBA rookie Caitlin Clark was snubbed for a spot on the Olympics women’s basketball team.
Today, Clark made … [+1047 chars]

articles.author: Caroline Thayer
articles.title: Original 'American Idol' winner Kelly Clarkson reveals if she'd return after quitting rival show 'The Voice' - Fox News
articles.description: Original "American Idol" winner Kelly Clarkson is sharing if she'd take Katy Perry's role as judge on the show after quitting her gig on "The Voice."
articles.content:
Three short weeks ago, "American Idol" said goodbye to Katy Perry, leaving a vacant space on the judge's panel alongside Luke Bryan and Lionel Richie.
Since she announced her departure earlier this … [+2345 chars]

articles.title: Leonard Peltier, Native activist imprisoned for nearly 50 years, faces what may be "last chance" parole hearing - Yahoo! Voices
articles.description: Native American activist and federal prisoner Leonard Peltier, who has maintained his innocence in the murders of two FBI agents almost half a century ago...
articles.content: Native American activist and federal prisoner Leonard Peltier, who has maintained his innocence in the murders of two FBI agents almost half a century ago, is due for a full parole hearing Monday his… [+6759 chars]
